To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: AMPaquette@aol.com
Subject: Notice of Infringement under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act

     Our office represents Bridge Publications, Inc. ("BPI") and New Era
Publications
Int. ("NEPI"), exclusive licensees of the copyrights to the published works
of the
Scientology religion, which includes numerous books and tapes and tape
transcripts. 

     Please be advised that one of The Planet's subscribers has posted
literally
hundreds of pages of copyrighted works to which BPI and NEPI hold the
exclusive rights.  This subscriber has done so without the authorization of
our clients. 
Because of the massive number of infringements, the URLs where they are
located are an attachment to this notice.

     This subscriber's actions in placing these copyrighted works on his or
her
webpage on The Planet's website violates United States copyright law.
Accordingly, we
request that these copyrighted works be removed immediately. 

     We also ask that you preserve any and all documents pertaining to this
web site
and its subscriber including but not limited to: logs, data entry sheets,
applications--
electronic or otherwise--registrations forms, billings statements or
invoices, computer
print-outs, disks, hard drives, etc., for the purpose of identifying this
infringing
subscriber and for evidence in any future legal proceedings should such
actions become
necessary.

     I have a good faith belief, and in fact am certain, that the posting of
these works
through your system was not authorized by my clients, any agent of my
clients, or the
law.

     I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate
and that I am
authorized to act on behalf of BPI and NEPI in this matter.
